thread.title: James Corden, Neil Diamond perform Carpool Karaoke at Grammys
thread.title_full: James Corden, Neil Diamond perform Carpool Karaoke at Grammys

author: KATE FELDMAN
title: James Corden, Neil Diamond perform Carpool Karaoke at Grammys
text:
SEE IT: James Corden, Faith Hill, Jennifer Lopez, John Legend sing Neil Diamond’s ‘Sweet Caroline’ at Grammy Awards James Corden, Neil Diamond perform Carpool Karaoke at Grammys  33 PM 
James Corden brought Carpool Karaoke to the Grammys. 
The award show host invited his celebrity friends into the aisle Sunday night in a stunt reminiscent of Ellen DeGeneres’ selfie at the 2014 Oscars. James Corden brought back Carpool Karaoke with Blue Ivy, Jennifer Lopez, Neil Diamond, Faith Hill, Keith Urban, John Legend and others. (CBS) 
Faith Hill, John Legend, Jennifer Lopez, Keith Urban joined Corden and Neil Diamond in a makeshift cardboard car to sing “Sweet Caroline” — although not everyone seemed to know the words. 
Beyoncé’s daughter Blue Ivy, dressed as Prince, even joined the fun.
